data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aguiar, Alexandre P., Jennings, John T., Turrisi, Giuseppe F. (2010): Three new Middle-Eastern species of Foenatopus Smith (Hymenoptera: Stephanidae) with a new host record and key to species with two spots on the metasoma. Zootaxa 2714: 40-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199692
